mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NETIVE_PROJECT01_MEMBER (MBER_ID, MBER_NM, MBER_SEXDSTN, MBER_BRTHDY, MBER_CTTPC, MBER_PASSWORD, MBER_EMAIL, MBER_AREA, MBER_SRBDE, MBER_NCNM, MBER_PROFL_PHOTO) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, 'F', DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d'), #{tel}, #{pwd}, 'default@email', '00', DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d'), #{nickName}, 'default')
